description: A mysterious volcanic island in the New World with a unique dual geography. One half features burning landscapes with extreme heat, while the opposite side is frozen with massive ice formations. The island is surrounded by a sea of fire and is a former World Government military research facility under Dr. Vegapunk. It was abandoned following a catastrophic poison gas incident approximately four years before the Straw Hats' arrival.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Discover Burning Island
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat Pirates discover Punk Hazard, an uncharted volcanic island surrounded by a sea of fire that does not appear on their Log Pose.
keyEvents.significance: First New World island the Straw Hats explore, marking the beginning of the Punk Hazard Arc.

keyEvents.title: Landing Party Reaches Punk Hazard
keyEvents.description: Luffy, Zoro, Robin, and Usopp successfully land on Punk Hazard using Nami's cloud pathway to cross the sea of fire.
keyEvents.significance: The Straw Hats officially set foot on their first New World island.

keyEvents.title: Discovery of Punk Hazard Facility
keyEvents.description: The landing party discovers that Punk Hazard is a massive government-controlled facility marked with danger warnings and World Government insignia.
keyEvents.significance: Reveals that Punk Hazard is not just a natural volcanic island, but a former World Government facility with secrets to uncover.

keyEvents.title: Dragon Number Thirteen Appears
keyEvents.description: A massive fire-breathing dragon created by Dr. Vegapunk appears before the Straw Hats on Punk Hazard.
keyEvents.significance: First encounter with one of Vegapunk's creations on the island, establishing the dangerous nature of Punk Hazard.

statusHistory.reason: Former World Government facility, currently occupied by unknown forces

description: An island in the New World where Vice Admiral Smoker and the G-5 Marines are stationed. From here, Smoker intercepts the distress call from Punk Hazard.

keyEvents.title: Smoker and Tashigi Intercept Distress Signal
keyEvents.description: Vice Admiral Smoker and Captain Tashigi intercept the distress call from Punk Hazard while stationed at Raijin Island and decide to pursue the Straw Hats.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the Marine involvement in the Punk Hazard Arc and the reunion between Smoker and Luffy.
